title: Serious Help Needed!!!
body:
Ever since the new patch, my laptop has been crashing everytime I start a new match, it forces me to close down my laptop, the strange thing is, after I reboot and join the match I can finish the match fine without it crashing.
Because of this I have been placed in low priority ques.
Please help as I have no idea what the cause of this is, also if specs reqiurements change during a patch riot you should make this information instantly available!!!!!!!!

replies.body:
System requirements have not changed, so that's definitely not an issue here. It sounds like a recent windows update may have enabled the Game DVR feature inside the Windows Game Bar. This has caused similar issues in the past, so I'd recommend [disabling the game bar entirely](http://www.tenforums.com/tutorials/8637-game-bar-turn-off-windows-10-a.html) to see if anything changes.

Let me know if this helped.
